alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 12:58PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Harrison, east central Hancock and west central Jackson Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gulfport. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, St. Martin, Diamondhead, D`iberville, Latimer, Lyman, Gulf Hills and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 17 and 50. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 2 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson
